description:
As a guest
  I want to use coupon checkout feature
  So that I can get the promotion
name: Checkout with coupon Selected Products over Minimum Amount

elements.name: Checkout with coupon code:Selected Products over Minimum Amount

steps.name: I am on Admin Login Page
I fill correct account email to email field
I fill correct account password to password field
I click on login button
I should see successful login
I check intercom message notification frame and click clear intercom message button
I check intercom message notification frame and click intercom message close button
I check new feature alert notification frame and click new feature alert close button
I check and click exclude products panel close button
I check and click no thanks button
I am on Promotion Index Page
I input "7th Promotion" to search field
1st row of promotion list should contain "7th Promotion"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"7th Promotion Selected Products2020/06/10 01:00 AM toNever expiresAll Customers Coupon 6 / Unlimited Usage Record Edit","expectText":"7th Promotion"}

steps.name: I should see apply filter label
I should see row of select checkbox list
I click on 1st row of select checkbox list
I select publish of bulk actions dropdown
I should see alert
I am on Shop Product Index Page
I input "4th Product for Checkout" to search field
1st product of products list should contain "4th Product for Checkout"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"4th Product for CheckoutNT$20NT$10","expectText":"4th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on 1st product of products list
I should be redirected to Shop Product Show Page
I fill "50" to product quantity field
I click on add to cart button
I should see cart panel
I click on checkout button
I should be redirected to Shop Cart Page
I select country dropdown option included "Taiwan" of country list dropdown
I wait for 3 seconds for loading
I select delivery dropdown option included "Custom Delivery" of delivery method dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["7-11 Pickup and pay in store (B2C)","7-11 Pickup and pay in store (C2C)","7-11 Pickup only (B2C)","7-11 Pickup only (C2C)","Family Mart Pickup only (C2C)","Family Mart Pickup and pay in store (C2C)","(DBW) - LocalDelivery","(DBW) No integration 711 Pickup","(DBW) CustomDelivery","(DBW) Ezship pickup and pay in store","(DBW) Family Mart B2C - Pickup and pay in store","(DBW) 7-11 B2C - Pickup and pay in store","(DBW) 7-11 C2C - Pickup only","Family Mart Pickup and pay in store (B2C)","Custom Delivery","Family Mart Pickup only (B2C)","Family Mart Pickup (no integration)","7-11 Pickup (no integration)","ezship pickup and pay in store","Local Delivery"],"text":"Custom Delivery"}

steps.name: I wait for 3 seconds for loading
I select payment dropdown option included "Bank Transfer" of payment method dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["Taishin","CVS via O'Pay","ATM via O'Pay","WebATM via O'Pay","Credit Card via O'Pay","Barcode via ECpay","CVS via ECpay","Credit Card via ECpay","LINE Pay","Custom","Cash on Delivery","Bank Transfer","Credit card or Paypal (Paypal Express)","GMO","Credit Card via NewebPay","Credit Card (Support Visa, Master, JCB overseas transaction)"],"text":"Bank Transfer"}

steps.name: I wait for 10 seconds for loading
I scroll down to apply coupon code button
I click on apply coupon code button
I should see coupon code field
I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I input "SelectedProduct" to coupon code field
I wait for 3 seconds for loading
promotion description should contain "SelectedProduct"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"Applied PromotionsSelectedProduct7th Promotion - Selected Products: Get 20% off over NT$500-NT$100Remove","expectText":"SelectedProduct"}

steps.name: I click on proceed to checkout button
I should be redirected to Shop Checkout Page
I fill name to name field
I fill email to email address field
I fill phone to contact number field
I click on same as checkbox
I click on agree terms checkbox
I click on accept marketing checkbox
I click on place order button
I should be redirected to Shop Order Confirm Page
I click on summary collapse
1st row of product unit price should contain "NT$10"
1st row of product quantity should equal to "50"
1st row of product items should contain "4th Product for Checkout"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"4th Product for CheckoutSelectedProduct7th PromotionNT$10NT$2050NT$500","expectText":"4th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: item subtotal should contain "NT$500"
delivery fee should contain "NT$10"
total should contain "NT$410"
discount applied should contain "7th Promotion"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"Applied PromotionsSelectedProduct7th Promotion - Selected Products: Get 20% off over NT$500-NT$100","expectText":"7th Promotion"}

steps.name: discount applied should contain "SelectedProduct"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"Applied PromotionsSelectedProduct7th Promotion - Selected Products: Get 20% off over NT$500-NT$100","expectText":"SelectedProduct"}

steps.name: I am on Orders Page
I click on 1st row of order links
I should be redirected to Orders Show Page
order date should contain order date
customer name should contain name
customer email should contain email
customer phone should contain phone
payment type should contain "Bank Transfer"
delivery method should contain "Custom Delivery"
recipient name should contain name
recipient phone should contain phone
delivery fee should contain "NT$10"
total should contain "NT$410"
---ROLL BACK---
I am on Promotion Index Page
I input "7th Promotion" to search field
I should see apply filter label
I should see 1 row of promotion list
1st row of promotion list should contain "7th Promotion"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"7th Promotion Selected Products2020/06/10 01:00 AM toNever expiresAll Customers Coupon 7 / Unlimited Usage Record Edit","expectText":"7th Promotion"}

steps.name: I click on 1st row of select checkbox list
I select unpublish of bulk actions dropdown
I should see 1 unpublished item
